category.name: Thin Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MfgValidationTestFramework_Clients
preference.preference_description: Defines the clients that will be communicating with the Manufacturing Validation Test Framework. Each entry is the name of another preference of this form. "MfgValidationTestFramework_Client_<ClientIdentifier>_ValidationTestTypes" where "ClientIdentifier" is a unique client identifier that communicates with the Manufacturing Validation Test Framework. For example: See preference MfgValidationTestFramework_Client_EP_WI_ValidationTestTypes. Currently, a single tcserver instance can handle 'one' validation test client.
